english_translation: Narrated by Ya'la ibn Murrah al-Thaqafi: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ saw me using kohl (coloring), and said: "Do you have a wife?" I said: "No." He said: "Wash it, then wash it, then wash it, then do not repeat it."
